text: Juan Pablo Valencia (born 2 May 1988) is a Colombian professional racing cyclist. He was named in the start list for the 2015 Vuelta a España. ==Major results== ;2012 :2nd Coppa Placci :4th GP Capodarco ;2015 :1st 20px Mountains classification Tour of Turkey ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Medellín Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Juan Pablo Valencia
